message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. Can you consider that?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After reconsidering, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $85.
I'm still a bit above my budget, so I'm willing to go down to $78. Can you consider that?
I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer it to you for $82.
I'm getting close, but I still need to save a bit more. Can you consider $76?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $80.
I'm really close, but I think I can go a bit lower. Can you consider $78?
